attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people are so sick and tired of having the scum of the earth walking our streets. We are sick of being 2nd class citizens in our own country. We are sick and tired of a government that does nothing for the indigenous people of Britain. Immigrants first, PC first, EU before UK....UK citizens at the bottom of the heap!! You certainly won't get my vote unless you clean up the mess you have made.We want our human rights back.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
